comments.raw_text:
During fix of bug 658894 I found out we sometimes don't store time for connectEnd attribute.  This is with high priority caused by the missing notification from socket transport, not delivered at [1].

This might be some race condition or just missing forward from nsHalfOpenSocket, but not 100% sure at the moment with that.

I'd love to fix this till aurora merge, if the fix were simple as it might cause inaccuracy in the telemetry (hopefully getting in to next aurora).

[1] http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/netwerk/protocol/http/nsHttpTransaction.cpp#356
comments.creator: honzab.moz@firemni.cz
comments.text:
During fix of bug 658894 I found out we sometimes don't store time for connectEnd attribute.  This is with high priority caused by the missing notification from socket transport, not delivered at [1].

This might be some race condition or just missing forward from nsHalfOpenSocket, but not 100% sure at the moment with that.

I'd love to fix this till aurora merge, if the fix were simple as it might cause inaccuracy in the telemetry (hopefully getting in to next aurora).

[1] http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/netwerk/protocol/http/nsHttpTransaction.cpp#356
